Sometimes I hear ringing and sometimes I don't. My right ear hears fine except it can't do well with loud noises. It's gotten to the point where it would make me wince and cringe if I just eat potato crisps. People talking moderately in the car also sets my right ear ringing. You can imagine the hell I go through when dentists use their sonic tool thingy at my dental appointments. I've been using on ear headphones almost everyday at a moderate to low volume. Has this affected my right ear? My only solution to muffle the noise is to wear industrial ear muffs as regular ear plugs do not work at all. I wear it to church mainly because of the loud music. If anyone knows anything about this issue please let me know. I really wanted to see Porter Robinson and Madeon but couldn't because of this :/

Honestly just look stuff up on the [wiki](https://terraria.gamepedia.com) but, long story short, you can just kill the lunar cultists and the 4 different pillars again to spawn the moon lord. It's not necessary for you to spawn him with the summoning item.

I just built the outline in the middle of the water and up past the surface. Once that was done I just...used the Super Absorbant Sponge hahah. I rarely use pumps/outlets/etc.
Great idea! It wasn't really complete as I didn't catch enough fish/fish-like weapons to make it a full trophy room kind of thing but a light house is a better idea :)

A lot of the ship's inspiration came from [this post] (https://www.reddit.com/r/Terraria/comments/3gpkhy/pirate_ship_the_captain_continually_leaps_from/).

WRITING.TITLE: Fishing power/level query
WRITING.TEXT: I've been playing Terraria for a bit (only 313 hours) and I've gone fishing but have only ever used bait and the Sitting Duck's Fishing Pole. I'm trying to catch the Scaly Truffle which summons the Pigron mount and am wondering if my Angler armour will help increase my chances of catching the Truffle. I was just wondering if fishing LEVEL is the same thing as fishing POWER. The tool tip for fishing poles have 'x% fishing power' while the Angler armour just states it 'increases fishing level'. Any help regarding this would be greatly appreciated :)
bless your soul
bless your soul
